featured.text: There is no death; only a change of worlds—the author delivers these reassurances to readers in this book, based on the customs of the Plains Indians in America.
I work there at the customs.
Wearing a bindi has become more of a fashion statement than a religious custom.

definition.zh_def: 根據個人或特定需求而設計或製作的事物。
definition.en_def: Something made or done to order for a particular customer.
definition.example: She ordered a custom dress for the wedding.
